```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidymodels)
library(magrittr)
data <- data.table::fread("./data/WA_Fn-UseC_-Telco-Customer-Churn.csv",
                          stringsAsFactors = T)
set.seed(123)
```

```{r}
glimpse(data)
```

```{r}
any(is.na(data))
```

```{r}
visdat::vis_miss(data)
```

```{r}
data <- data %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  select(-customerID)
```

```{r}
Hmisc::describe(data)
```

```{r}
data %>% 
  select_if(is.numeric) %>% 
  cor %>% 
  corrplot::corrplot(type = "upper", 
                     tl.col = "black")
```

```{r}
data_split <- initial_split(data, prop = 3/4, strata = PhoneService)
data_train <- training(data_split)
data_test <- testing(data_split)

data_cv <- rsample::vfold_cv(data_train)
```

```{r}
lr_recipe <- recipe(Churn ~ ., data_train) %>% 
  step_dummy(all_nominal(), -all_outcomes()) %>% 
  step_nzv(all_numeric())
```

```{r}
lr_model <- 
  logistic_reg(mode = "classification") %>% 
  set_engine("glm")
```

```{r}
lr_wf <- 
  workflow() %>% 
  add_model(lr_model) %>% 
  add_recipe(lr_recipe)
```

```{r message=FALSE}
lr_fit_cv <- fit_resamples(lr_wf, resamples = data_cv)
```

```{r}
collect_metrics(lr_fit_cv)
```
